  • Prerequisite

    To use the main functionality of the ConceptFunder:
    1. Creation of a crowdfunding company
    2. Participation in financing crowdfunding companies
    it is necessary to have MetaMask browser extension with adjusted wallet and ehtereum account. During first visit of site MetaMask suggest to connect Ethereum account. Connected account will be used to accomblish interaction with contract: - Creation crowdfunsing company - Participating in crowdfunding company - Creation request for payout - Approve request for payout

    How to create your first crowdfunding campaign
